ANNarchy (Artificial Neural Networks architect) is a neuro-simulator for rate-coded and spiking neural networks in Python. 

The source code is available at <https://github.com/ANNarchy/ANNarchy>, while the full documentation is at: <https://annarchy.github.io>.


### Program

* 14:00 - 15:30 : Introduction to ANNarchy and spiking neural networks
* 15:30 - 16:00 : Coffee break
* 16:00 - 17:20 : BOLD monitoring and fitting
